org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt
Class FairSimulationOptimizer

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.FairSimulationOptimizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, AutomatonOptimizer<FSA>
public class FairSimulationOptimizer
extends AbstractAlgorithm
implements AutomatonOptimizer<FSA>

This class provides an implementation of the simplification with fair simulation relations in [Sankar Gurumurthy, Roderick Bloem, Fabio Somenzi: Fair Simulation Minimization. CAV 2002: 610-624]. Instead of small progress measure applied in the paper, we use McNaughton-Zielonka to solve fair simulation games. Similar to the small progress measure approach that can reuse previously computed progress measures, we use the results of the McNaughton-Zielonka solver to reduce the fair simulation games.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

static java.lang.String O_INCREMENTAL
          The option of modifying fair simulation games incrementally and using previous results to reduce fair simulation games.
